analysis.Summary: Vue single-file component that renders the Line messenger social icon as an inline SVG.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable Line social media icon within the UI, leveraging global CSS variables for theming.

Components.name: default export (LineIcon)
Components.description: A functional Vue component that injects the inline SVG markup for the Line icon.

Dependencies: Global CSS variable --white for fill color
analysis.Usage: Import this component via `import LineIcon from 'modules/icons/socials/line.vue'` and use it in templates as `<LineIcon/>` to display the icon.
Notes: This component contains only a <template> section—no <script> or <style>.
The fill color is set to `rgb(var(--white))`, so it inherits theming from a CSS variable.
Static, presentational component meant to be part of an icon library within the martyrs framework.
